sekolah.name: Sekolah Harapan Pemulung
sekolah.description: Sekolah Harapan Pemulung adalah sekolah non formal yang resmi terdaftar di Diknas sebagai Pusat Kegiatan Belajar Masyarakat atau PKBM. Atau yang lazim disebut dengan Paket A, Paket B dan Paket C. Kurikulum yang kami gunakan sama seperti PKBM yang lain. Kurikulum yang mengacu ke Diknas dengan mata pelajaran dasar yang diujikan pada Ujian Nasional.

sekolah.name: Sekolah Maju Bersama
sekolah.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.
